title: Canada's Trudeau slammed over rising inflation as election race tightens
content:
1. Canada's Trudeau slammed over rising inflation as election race tightens  Reuters Canada
  2. 'The most powerful person in Canada shouldn’t give a sh—': Canada has mixed reaction to Trudeau defending wife from angry heckler  Yahoo News
  3. Canada election: Liberals, Conservatives in dead heat as campaign enters final days, poll finds  Global News
  4. Opinion | Don't blame Canada's vitriolic election on U.S. politics. It's as Canadian as it gets.  The Washington Post
  5. Canada is a pedestrian nation  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
